eval_cases.description: Test DevOps specialist provides deployment recommendations

parts.text: How should I set up CI/CD for a microservices application?

For microservices CI/CD setup: 1) Source Control: Use monorepo with GitLab/GitHub, separate folders per service. 2) CI Pipeline: Jenkins/GitLab CI with stages - lint, test, build, security scan. 3) Container Registry: Harbor or GCR for Docker images with vulnerability scanning. 4) CD Strategy: GitOps with ArgoCD for Kubernetes deployments. 5) Environment Promotion: dev → staging → production with manual approval gates. 6) Testing: Unit tests in CI, integration tests in staging, smoke tests post-deployment. 7) Monitoring: Integrate deployment events with Datadog/New Relic. 8) Rollback: Blue-green deployments with instant rollback capability. This ensures reliable, automated deployments with proper quality gates.
